name: Stone Wheels
description:
150000 b.c. there was one leader election method …and it was… Stone Wheels

Stone Wheels can be played by 2 players...the objective is simple...you must survive 1 minute of obstacles. Remember… There Can Be Only One!

How to play:

  • Player 1: Left and Right arrow keys to move // Tap Enter to boost. Pad Left and Right // Tap B to boost.
  • Player 2: A and B to move // Tap Space bar to boost.

You can push your opponent and hit with the back of the vehicle.

Credits:

A game made for Ludum Dare 36 (link)
